title: The Rules
description: Alice has decided to accept Hollywood actor Oliver Park's proposition and be his 'special assistant'. However, she didn't fully understand the rules of the arrangement until it was too late.Now that she has become a part of Oliver's life, she doesn't know if she can obey the rules and still be okay. She feels as if she is walking down a path that she may never be able to recover from.When Maribel Gold and her father John enter the equation, it is all Alice can do to stay sane. Will she continue to be Oliver's assistant or will she decide to stop playing the game?'The Rule's' is book 3 in 'The Millionaire's Assistant' series. It is a short hot erotic romance that will add spice to anyone's life. The final book in the series 'The Game Changer' will be out soon.
author: Helen    Cooper
